select * from RangeParamInfoTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType#
statements.statement: select TOP 1 c.* from CalibrationParamInfoTb as c,ReagentStateinfor1r2Tb as r1r2,ReagentSettingsTb as r1,ReagentSettingstbr2 as r2,ProjectRunSequenceTb as run,SDTTableItemTb as s where s.ProjectName=c.ProjectName and s.SampleType=c.SampleType and s.CalibState='WAITING' and r1r2.ProjectName=c.ProjectName and (r1r2.ReagentType=c.SampleType or r1r2.ReagentType2=c.SampleType) and r1r2.Locked='false' and run.ProjectName = c.ProjectName and ((r1.ProjectName=c.ProjectName and r1.ReagentType=c.SampleType) or (r2.ProjectName=c.ProjectName and r2.ReagentType=c.SampleType)) ORDER BY run.RunSequence
select * from CalibrationParamInfoTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType#
